    if (test === true) {

      "4",
      "5",
      "6",
      "7",
      "8",
      "9",
      "9",
      "9",
    ];
    for (let i = 0; i < fanN.length; i++) {
      testN = _.includes(groupN, fanN[i]);
    }
    const groupS = _.map(this.state.hand, "suit");
    const testS = groupS.every((s) => s === groupS[0]);
    if (testN && testS === true) {
      this.setState({
        ...this.state,
        points: this.state.points + 88,
      });
    }
  };
